articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Helldivers 2 Players Descend Upon Planet Tien Kwan in Bid to Unlock Mechs - IGN
articles.description: The Helldivers 2 galactic war has taken another turn, this time seemingly locking the release of mechs behind the liberation of a planet called Tien Kwan.
articles.content:
The Helldivers 2 galactic war has taken another turn, as it always promised to, this time seemingly locking the release of mechs behind the liberation of a planet.
